titleStmt.title: The second part of the historie, called The nature of a woman contayning the end of the strife betwixt Perseus and Theseus. Compiled by C.M.
titleStmt.author: C. M., fl. 1596.
Middleton, Christopher, 1560?-1628, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Widow Orwin for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the little north-doore of S. Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The second part of the nature of a woman.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the little north-doore of S. Paules Church
